hero.headline: Keep Your Cool with Coolsys: Expert HVAC Solutions
hero.subhead: Reliable refrigeration and HVAC services in Salem, OR, and beyond. Installation, maintenance, and repair for residential and commercial clients.

features.title: 24/7 Emergency Service
features.description: Unexpected HVAC issues? We're available around the clock to provide prompt and reliable emergency repair services.

features.title: Energy-Efficient Upgrades
features.description: Reduce your energy bills and carbon footprint with our energy-efficient HVAC system upgrades. We can assess your needs and recommend the best solutions.

features.title: Preventative Maintenance Plans
features.description: Extend the lifespan of your HVAC equipment and prevent costly breakdowns with our comprehensive preventative maintenance plans. Tailored to your specific needs.

reviews.name: Sarah M.
reviews.text: Coolsys was a lifesaver! Our AC broke down during a heatwave, and they were at our house within the hour. The technician was professional and quickly diagnosed the problem. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: John B.
reviews.text: We use Coolsys for all our commercial refrigeration needs. They're always responsive, provide excellent service, and their prices are fair. A reliable partner for our business.

reviews.name: Emily K.
reviews.text: I recently had Coolsys install a new HVAC system in my home, and I couldn't be happier. The process was smooth, the installation was clean, and the new system is so much more efficient than my old one.
